description: Manage migration workflows for PostgreSQL Flexible Servers.

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server migration check-name-availability
commands.summary: Checks if the provided migration-name can be used.
examples: az postgres flexible-server migration check-name-availability --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --migration-name xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server migration create
commands.summary: Create a new migration workflow for a flexible server.
commands.syntax:
az postgres flexible-server migration create --name
                                             --properties
                                             --resource-group
                                             [--location]
                                             [--migration-mode {offline, online}]
                                             [--migration-name]
                                             [--migration-option {Migrate, Validate, ValidateAndMigrate}]
                                             [--tags]
examples: az postgres flexible-server migration create --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver       --migration-name testmigration --properties "migrationConfig.json"

az postgres flexible-server migration create --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver       --migration-name testmigration --properties "migrationConfig.json" --migration-mode offline

az postgres flexible-server migration create --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver       --migration-name testmigration --properties "migrationConfig.json" --migration-mode online --migration-option Validate

az postgres flexible-server migration create --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver       --migration-name testmigration --properties "migrationConfig.json" --migration-option Migrate

az postgres flexible-server migration create --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver         --migration-name testmigration --properties "migrationConfig.json"

az postgres flexible-server migration create --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --migration-name testmigration --properties "migrationConfig.json"

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server migration list
commands.summary: List the migrations of a flexible server.
commands.syntax:
az postgres flexible-server migration list --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--filter {Active, All}]
examples: az postgres flexible-server migration list --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --filter Active
az postgres flexible-server migration list --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --filter All

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server migration show
commands.summary: Get the details of a specific migration.
examples: az postgres flexible-server migration show --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --migration-name testmigration

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server migration update
examples: az postgres flexible-server migration update --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --migration-name testmigration --setup-replication
az postgres flexible-server migration update --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --migration-name testmigration --cutover
az postgres flexible-server migration update --subscription xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --resource-group testGroup --name testserver --migration-name testmigration --cancel
